attributes.contentHtml: psto Are you okay in the head? You don't have to curse or make threats to be disrespectful. You disrespected my time by leaving me to just wait indefinitely for you. That is disrespectful. And the way you spoke to me and how you ended the conversation was extremely immature.

attributes.title: Affinity | Minecraft Server | Immature owners and fishing for members

attributes.contentHtml:
Rismose It was a misunderstanding how I tried to word things.. also I'm okay thanks for asking..

But, I wasn't disrespecting YOU in general.. I was saying "Why you keep leaving and joining back like damn" that was a misunderstanding, the "damn" part I'm sorry about that.. but it's no point of saying sorry if you're not going to accept me.

Rismose Can you just unblock me and talk to me in Discord, so we won't have to type like Twitter people, because I just want to talk and tell you that I'm sorry.. like very sorry and I don't want Affinity being called a bad server.. Like please stop.
